question: In the next few weeks, assembly elections will be held in Madhya Pradesh. Will you vote in this election?
If the Assembly elections were to be held tomorrow, who will you vote for?
In the coming Assembly elections, what will be the single most important election issue for you?
Are you satisfied or dissatisfied with the performance present MLA of your area?
While deciding who to vote for in the Assembly election, what will be the most important consideration for you – party, local candidate or chief ministerial candidate of the party?
Are you satisfied or dissatisfied with the performance of the Narendra Modi led BJP Central government over the last nine and a half years?
Parties often nominate central government ministers or MPs to contest in the Assembly elections. Is this right or wrong according to you?
Have you anyone in your family (a female member) benefitted from the of Ladli Behena Yojana?
